title: Calving Later Makes all the Difference

tasks.task: Implement rotational grazing to improve cattle health and grass management.
subtasks: Observe and assess cattle to determine if they maintain or improve their shape.
Monitor feed consumption during winter months to reduce feed input.
Evaluate grass health and growth to meet goals of controlling cool season grasses.
Ensure calves are in good condition when grazing green grass.
Manage timing of grazing to align with natural cycles.

tasks.task: Adapt grazing strategy to reduce stress on cattle and the environment.
subtasks: Adjust livestock management practices to minimize stress.
Align grazing activities with natural seasonal patterns for optimal results.
